adjective.description: Including or containing people from many different countries.
examples: immigration transformed the city into a cosmopolitan metropolis

adjective.description: (of a plant or animal) found all over the world.

noun.description: A plant or animal found all over the world.
A cocktail typically made with vodka, Cointreau, cranberry juice, and lime juice.

origin: Mid 17th century (as a noun): from cosmopolite + -an.
